character.age: 27 years old, with a rugged edge from adventures gone wrong.
character.role: Main Protagonist, Hero and Righteous Warrior
character.background: Kaid is the son of a legendary blacksmith. Born in the mountains, he learned how to wield a sword and forge his own destiny. However, after witnessing his village being burned down by an enemy clan, Kaid's life took a dark turn. He dedicated himself to seeking revenge and protecting innocent lives.

physical-appearance.eye-color: Brown, with a sharp glint from years of fighting
physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown, often tied in a ponytail
